item.title: Error on invalid names code
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

You don’t have a banHandler in your server. You’ll need to find one and add it.

item.title: Error on invalid names code
item.dc:creator: @jackeychan jackeychan
item.description:
@jackeychan wrote:

for (int j = 0; j < IllegalUsernameChars.length; j++) { if (playerName.toLowerCase().contains(IllegalUsernameChars[j])) { if (checkbannedusers() != 5) { server.banHandler.appendToBanned(playerName); server.playerHandler.kickNick = playerName; } } }
i get error in

client.java:13597: cannot find symbol symbol : variable banHandler location: class server server.banHandler.appendToBanned(playerName); ^

Read full topic
